The cash slot is sturdy as well but does not have a zipper to close it. customer_reviews.title: Excellent wallet with some very minor drawbacks

Also, be aware that, due to the construction of the wallet, if you fill all of the car pockets in the right sleeve, they will gradually fan out and put a little stress on the card closest to the front. Otherwise, this is an excellent wallet with a clean look and quality build.

customer_reviews.text: Would buy this again! In the past I've bought Docker's brand wallets because I liked to carry around like 12 cards, but this one is perfect if you only need to carry about 7-9 cards. The best part is the removable card holder for an ID.

customer_reviews.text: It is a nice wallet however it is a little stiff. It doesn't hold many cards. On the other hand, it came it very nice packaging so it would make a nice gift. It closes nicely with cards inside. I think it is great for a teen to young man.

customer_reviews.text: I like this kind of wallets, very simple and great quality. I've had it for a year now, the leather is till very fine with no scratches, the extra ID compartments made from clear plastic are not of good quality; one of them is now torn from the side. But still I very much recommend it.
